title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 17
description: The Pine Guard welcomes and interrogates their new companion, and has another brush with the intangible, unlucky forces that seem to be conspiring against them. Duck teaches talking. Aubrey throws a drink. Ned threatens a book.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
